trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk X12 Connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk X12 Connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: How to create and configure the BizTalk X12 Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: How to create and configure the BizTalk X12 Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Get started with the BizTalk X12 API App and add it to your Logic App
trans-unit.target: Get started with the BizTalk X12 API App and add it to your Logic App

trans-unit.source: Use the BizTalk X12 service to receive and send messages per the X12 protocol in business to business communications.
trans-unit.target: Use the BizTalk X12 service to receive and send messages per the X12 protocol in business to business communications.

trans-unit.source: X12 is also commonly referred to as ASC X12 or Accredited Standards Committee X12 and is widely used across industries.
trans-unit.target: X12 is also commonly referred to as ASC X12 or Accredited Standards Committee X12 and is widely used across industries.

trans-unit.source: You can add the BizTalk X12 API App to your business workflow and process data as part of a business-to-business workflow within a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: You can add the BizTalk X12 API App to your business workflow and process data as part of a business-to-business workflow within a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: TPM API App: Before creating a X12 connector, you have to create a <link><linkText>BizTalk Trading Partner Management Connector[1]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: TPM API App: Before creating a X12 connector, you have to create a <link><linkText>BizTalk Trading Partner Management Connector[1]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: SQL Azure database: Each of the B2B API Apps requires its own Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: SQL Azure database: Each of the B2B API Apps requires its own Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Azure Service Bus: This is optional, and used only in the case of batching.
trans-unit.target: Azure Service Bus: This is optional, and used only in the case of batching.

trans-unit.source: To use the BizTalk X12 Connector, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk X12 Connector API app.
trans-unit.target: To use the BizTalk X12 Connector, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk X12 Connector API app.

trans-unit.source: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk X12 Connector API app from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk X12 Connector API app from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: Trading partners are the entities involved in B2B (Business-to-Business) communications.
trans-unit.target: Trading partners are the entities involved in B2B (Business-to-Business) communications.

trans-unit.source: When two partners establish a relationship, this is referred to as an Agreement.
trans-unit.target: When two partners establish a relationship, this is referred to as an Agreement.

trans-unit.source: The agreement defined is based on the communication the two partners wish to achieve and is protocol or transport specific.
trans-unit.target: The agreement defined is based on the communication the two partners wish to achieve and is protocol or transport specific.

trans-unit.source: Steps to create a trading partner agreement are documented <link><linkText>here[2]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Steps to create a trading partner agreement are documented <link><linkText>here[2]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Using X12 Connector in Logic Apps designer surface
trans-unit.target: Using X12 Connector in Logic Apps designer surface

trans-unit.source: X12 Connector can be used either as a trigger or as an action.
trans-unit.target: X12 Connector can be used either as a trigger or as an action.

trans-unit.source: Launch the Azure Logic Apps flow designer.
trans-unit.target: Launch the Azure Logic Apps flow designer.

trans-unit.source: Click on X12 Connector from the right pane:
trans-unit.target: Click on X12 Connector from the right pane:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk X12 Connector exposes a single trigger.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk X12 Connector exposes a single trigger.

trans-unit.source: As part of the output, the connector returns the X12 payload, agreement id as well as information as to whether the message is batched, or not.
trans-unit.target: As part of the output, the connector returns the X12 payload, agreement id as well as information as to whether the message is batched, or not.

trans-unit.source: Click on X12 Connector from the right pane:
trans-unit.target: Click on X12 Connector from the right pane:

trans-unit.source: Provide the inputs for the action and configure it:
trans-unit.target: Provide the inputs for the action and configure it:

trans-unit.source: The action returns an object containing the X12 payload.
trans-unit.target: The action returns an object containing the X12 payload.

trans-unit.source: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business flow using a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business flow using a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: View the Swagger REST API reference at <link><linkText>Connectors and API Apps Reference</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: View the Swagger REST API reference at <link><linkText>Connectors and API Apps Reference</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.
trans-unit.target: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Manage and Monitor API apps and connector</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Manage and Monitor API apps and connector</linkText><title></title></link>.
